observation: Abbott Capital Management - Private equity and venture capital  Skip to content News & Views Contact Investor login About Us Team Strategies Primaries Secondaries Co-Investments Solutions ESG & Responsible Investing Investing in private equity and venture capital doesn’t need to be complex With more than three decades of experience, we can help you invest thoughtfully and confidently Get in touch Founded in 1986 Multiple private equity strategies $25+ billion in commitments since inception Independently owned 50+ People  Two Offices  One Team Meet the team We provide a comprehensive range of private equity and venture capital solutions 01 Investing in funds across strategies and geographies 02 Leveraging our relationship and information advantages 03 Partnering with our GPs to invest directly into companies We’ve evolved alongside our clients, refining and tailoring solutions to meet their goals. Find out more Views Secondary Sightings: Part I We begin this multi-part installment on private equity secondaries by sharing our perspective on the market and taking a deep dive into secondary investments — what they are, how they can generate returns for investors, their role in private equity portfolio... Events BAI Alternative Investor Conference – April 2024 Jobst Klemme, Wolf Witt, and Moritz Turck will be attending the BAI Alternative Investor Conference in Frankfurt, Germany on 22 - 24 April 2024. McGuireWoods Emerging Manager Conference – April 2024 Jonathan Tubiana, Managing Director, Investments, and Layla Beyzavi, Vice President, Marketing and Client Solutions, will be attending the McGuireWoods Emerging Manager Conference at The Ritz-Carlton in Dallas, TX on April 16 – 17, 2024. PEI Investor Relations, Marketing & Communications Forum – April 2024 Samantha Hewitt, Director, Investor Relations, and Keri Gawlik, Vice President, Investor Relations, will be attending the Private Equity International, Investor Relations, Marketing & Communications Forum at Convene in New York, NY on April 10 – 11, 2024. LinkedIn New York office 640 Fifth Avenue, 7th Floor +1 212 757 2700 London office 53 Davies Street +44 (0) 20 3178 2613 ©2024 Abbott Capital Management, LLC. All rights reserved. Functionality cookies These cookies are used to recognise you when you return to our website, allowing us to personalise content for you and to remember your preferences. If you do not accept these cookies, some or all of these services may not function properly. Performance and targeting cookies These cookies allow us to recognise and count the visitors to our website, and to see how visitors interact with our site. We can then use these insights to improve the way our website works. We also use this information to make our website and the advertising you see more relevant to your interests. please read our privacy notice in full. Save preferences

thought: The extracted text shows that Abbott Capital Management is presenting itself as a legitimate private equity and venture capital firm with a history since 1986, substantial commitments in private equity, and an active participation in industry events. The website contains contact information, references to an investor login, a team section, and upcoming events which all appear professional. There are no immediate signs of unusually low prices, unrealistic money claims, or targeting of psychological weaknesses. The presence of a privacy notice and cookie policy indicates an awareness and adherence to standard online practices for user data. However, I need to verify the authenticity of the company and the website information.

thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain abbottcapital.com is registered and has been in existence since 1997, which suggests longevity and a less likely chance of being a scam. The domain uses privacy protection services to keep the registrant's details confidential, which is common practice and not immediately indicative of a scam. The domain is registered with Network Solutions, a reputable domain registrar, and is set to expire in 2025, indicating a commitment to maintaining the domain. However, I still need to validate the reputation and check for any red flags that may suggest it's a scam.

Firm Operations.'}, {'url': 'https://brokerchooser.com/safety/warner-abbott-capital-management-broker-safe-or-scam', 'content': 'Warner Abbott Capital Management might showcase appealing investment opportunities and you may have come across recommendations for Warner Abbott Capital Management in emails, forums, chat groups or on social media. This may raise the question whether it is a secure service provider.'}, {'url': 'https://adviserinfo.sec.gov/Firm/134334', 'content': "Please be aware that fraudsters may link to Investment Adviser Public Disclosure website from phishing and similar scam websites, trying to steal your personal information or your money. Make sure you know who you're dealing with when investing, and contact FINRA with any concerns. ... ABBOTT CAPITAL MANAGEMENT CORP., ABBOTT CAPITAL ..."}, {'url': 'https://consumer.ftc.gov/consumer-alerts/2023/07/it-legitimate-investment-opportunity-or-scam', 'content': 'Here\'s what to know: Don\'t accept any unsolicited offers. If you get an out-of-the-blue call, text, or email about "an amazing investment opportunity," it\'s a scam. Walk away. Don\'t believe promises that you\'ll make money or earn guaranteed returns. No one can guarantee you\'ll make lots of money with little to no risk.'}]

thought: The search results provided do not indicate that Abbott Capital Management itself is associated with scams. One of the search results points to Glassdoor reviews which discuss the company's work environment rather than any fraudulent activities. Another result directs to the team page of Abbott Capital's own website. There is mention of Warner Abbott Capital Management, which seems to be a different entity, and it is being questioned for its legitimacy. The SEC link advises caution regarding investment opportunities but does not specifically mention Abbott Capital Management as a scam. Finally, a general advisory from the FTC on avoiding investment scams is provided, but it does not target Abbott Capital specifically. Given that none of the search results link directly to the Abbott Capital Management being a scam, and considering its long-standing domain registration, no obvious red flags from the website content, and the involvement in industry events, it is reasonable to conclude that https://www.abbottcapital.com/ is not a scam website.
